attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A serious statement indicating real concern regarding 'Equitable Life' savers who have lost thousands and thousand of pounds.This issue is long,long overdue at being resolved. 
Perhaps the Ombudsman can finally clarify the situation before some of the innocent victims actually die.

This issue has been discussed so many times,long long before such problems as has hit 'Northern Rock' for example.
Please ask the Prime Minister to finally sort out the issues connected with such a reputable pension scheme.
This really has been a long time overdue.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
